scripts.build:ios: xcodebuild -workspace ios/20Questions.xcworkspace -scheme 20Questions -configuration Release -archivePath ../builds/ios/20Questions.xcarchive archive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath ../builds/ios/20Questions.xcarchive -exportPath ../builds/ios/ -exportOptionsPlist ios/exportOptions.plist
scripts.build:android:debug: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && mkdir -p ../../builds/android && cp app/build/outputs/apk/debug/*.apk ../../builds/android/ && cd ..
scripts.build:android:release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && mkdir -p ../../builds/android && cp app/build/outputs/apk/release/*.apk ../../builds/android/ && cd ..
scripts.build:android:bundle: cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && mkdir -p ../../builds/android && cp app/build/outputs/bundle/release/*.aab ../../builds/android/ && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ios && npm run build:android:bundle
